title: How do you remove the parallax effect for wallpaper?
content: When I try to set a wallpaper, it doesn't align properly with what I set and moves when I scroll across pages. The same problem happens in the lock screen; it is weirdly zoomed in and offset to the right. Is there a way to turn off the parallax effect so that this doesn't happen?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
